strategy

Interface Board


  • public interface Board
    This interface describes the only behavior that a client can assume when a game is created by calling the appropriate factory method, makeGame() in the StrategyGameFactory.
    Version:
    Mar 18, 2019

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Board.SquareType
      This enumeration identifies the type of square, or the terrain, that the square has on the board.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Piece getPieceAt(int row, int column)
      Given a row and column, return the piece on that square.
      default Board.SquareType getSquareTypeAt(int row, int column)
      Given a row and column, return the square type at that location.

    • Method Detail

      • getPieceAt

        default Piece getPieceAt(int row,
                         int column)
        Given a row and column, return the piece on that square. If there is no piece at that location, return null.
        Parameters:
        row -
        column -
        Returns:
        the piece at the location or null if there is no piece there
        Throws:
        StrategyException - if the row or column is invalid

      • getSquareTypeAt

        default Board.SquareType getSquareTypeAt(int row,
                                         int column)
        Given a row and column, return the square type at that location.
        Parameters:
        row -
        column -
        Returns:
        the type of square
        Throws:
        StrategyException - if the row or column is invalid
